items.description: Fresh lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, and onions topped with pepperoncinis, Greek olives, feta cheese, and oregano. Comes with homemade dressing.

items.description: Combo meal with Single Gyro sandwich, fries and your choice of drink (Soft Drinks, 20 oz, or 32 oz).

items.description: Combo meal with Philly cheesesteak, fries and your choice of drink (Soft Drinks, 20 oz, or 32 oz).

items.name: 3 Gyros Special
items.description: Buy two gyros, get one free.

items.name: Single Gyro
items.description: Served on a toasted pita with gyro sauce, tomatoes, and onions. Available as a sandwich only or as a meal combo with fries and your choice of drink (Soft Drinks, 20 oz, or 32 oz).

items.name: Double Gyro Plate
items.description: Two toasted pitas served with a mound of gyro meat, gyro sauce, tomatoes, onions, and fries on the side.

items.name: Veggie Pita
items.description: Toasted pita topped with gyro sauce, feta cheese, onions, tomatoes, and banana peppers.

items.name: BBQ Gyro
items.description: Served with BBQ sauce.

items.name: Triple Gyro Plate
items.description: Three toasted pitas served with a mound of gyro meat, gyro sauce, tomatoes, onions, and fries on the side.

items.name: Hot Veggie Pita
items.description: Toasted pita topped with gyro sauce, feta cheese, onions, tomatoes, and banana peppers.

items.name: Italian Beef Sandwich
items.description: Thinly-sliced roast beef on French bread with your choice of red sauce or homemade gravy.

items.name: Italian Combo Sandwich
items.description: A combination of Italian beef and sausage on French bread with your choice of red sauce or homemade gravy.

items.name: Italian Sausage Sandwich
items.description: Italian sausage link on French bread with your choice of red sauce or homemade gravy.

items.name: Chicago Hot Dog

items.description: Grilled onions, mustard, sport peppers and pickle spear.

items.name: Chili Dog
items.description: Chili, mustard, onion and pickle spear.

items.name: Burger
items.description: 100% beef with grilled onions, mustard, ketchup and pickles. Choose a size. 1/4 lb. 4.29 / 1/2 lb. 5.29

items.description: 100% beef with chili and American cheese. Choose a size. 1/4 lb. 3.99 / 1/2 lb. 4.69

items.name: Chicken Strips
